name: h3
description: Unleash your boldest swings with the 2026 Easton MAV1 Flash BBCOR Bat, designed to electrify the field with explosive energy and vibrant style. This high-performance bat is tailored for hitters seeking a perfect balance of speed and control, featuring a 2 5/8-inch barrel diameter and a drop 3 length-to-weight ratio. Its standout Flashpoint Alloy enhances swing speed and barrel performance, while the innovative WaveWall Technology optimizes performance across a larger hitting surface. The Gen2 IN2UITY Feel Soft Knob and Flow-Tack Grip provide superior comfort and control, reducing vibration for a smooth swing path. Finished in a striking peach, pink, purple, and blue colorway, this BBCOR .50 certified bat is ready to dominate high school, college, and select Little League divisions, all backed by a 12-month warranty. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
